name: Perfect Salon
description:
Enjoy your Perfect Salon, helping clients look fantastic. Make them feel even more beautiful by applying face masks, shaving beards, waxing, remove pimples and enjoy many more procedures in your Salon.

It's very satisfying to see how clients feel better after the procedure. Make them smile and be happy after the Perfect Salon procedures.

Don't forget to upgrade your salon furniture, decor and collect your TIPS by the end of the day.
